item.title: Celebrating the Guiding Light: A Momentous Surprise for High Chief Gloria Dubi Ilemore from Ewa Omo Yagba Resources!
item.description: We gather today, on this remarkable occasion, to honor and pay tribute to a true pillar of Isanlu landâ€”High Chief Gloria Dubi Ilemore.
